title: Draft Normals matchmaking is so garbage
body:
Why are people in Silver being matched against people from Diamond and Platinum?

Is there literally no one playing LoL in OCE?

Norms is supposed to be the game mode where you can practice champions and roles and have fun. That's impossible when it's a stomp.

https://imgur.com/powtEJ0

replies.body:
just afk
riot doesn't give u any chance to have fun than just give same shit to enemy team
It's normals, and it's oce. You should be happy to play against higher ranked players though! It's boring for them, but great for you!

Premades will always throw a wrench into the works, especially if you are playing at odd hours of the night. It's also not uncommon for high ranked players to play pretty much exclusively ranked, and only play normals with friends every now and again which has the unfortunate effect of thoroughly skewing their normals MMR.

Plenty of higher ranked players will also only rarely play their main champions (and often their main roles) in normals, so their visible rank doesn't necessarily reflect their actual skill for whatever combination they're playing that game.

The best you can do in these scenarios is either have fun with the game or just learn as much as you can by observation.
